name: zoolander
description: Derek Zoolander's Corporate Style Guide to Help Product Teams Build Ridiculously Good Looking Websites

scripts.harp:compile: npm run harp compile styleguide dist
scripts.preversion: npm run harp compile styleguide dist && git add .
scripts.test:visual: nohup npm start & (cd ./node_modules/backstopjs && npm run test)
scripts.test:visual:init: nohup npm start & (cd ./node_modules/backstopjs && npm run reference)
